thread.section_title: Bake Me A Wish! Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bake Me A Wish! | www.bakemeawish.com | 3 of 186
thread.title: Paige
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Paige

author: Paige
title: Paige
text: I ordered 2 large cakes and when they were delivered they left them on the front porch. No knock or door bell to make sure someone was home to receive them. They could of been delivered hours before they were found. The safest part was if they had knocked there was someone there. I didn't spend $40 in delivery fees for them to be left on the porch to get bugs in them or turn bad in the weather. Really not happy with the service on that end. Too much money to spend for the recipitant not to be able to enjoy it.
